function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing measures in restaurants and cafes","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among patrons and staff","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing guidelines and regularly monitor compliance","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, reservation management software","People":"Restaurant patrons, staff","Owner":"Restaurant management"},{"Description":"Inadequate hygiene standards in food service establishments","Impact":"Increased risk of foodborne and droplet-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, implementation of strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"UV sterilization, air purification systems","People":"Restaurant patrons, staff","Owner":"Restaurant management"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of staff health and provision of protective clothing","Impact":"Increased risk of staff transmitting diseases to patrons and other staff","Mitigation":"Regular health checks for staff, provision of protective equipment","Technologies":"Temperature screening devices, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Restaurant patrons, staff","Owner":"Restaurant management"}]}
